attributes.action: Link the MP's allowance to the current State Pension for a single person
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently the Government expects a person to live, that is house feed and pay council tax on a figure of £95-25 per week i.e. the Basic State pension. In my understanding this is the purpose of the MP's second home allowance hence doesn't it make perfect logic to link the two together.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
